title: Mario Games History
description: Test your knowledge of Mario's gaming legacy!

questions.question: What year did the original Super Mario Bros. release?
questions.explanation: Super Mario Bros. was released in 1985 for the NES and became one of the best-selling games of all time!

questions.question: Mario first appeared in the game Donkey Kong.
questions.explanation: Mario debuted as 'Jumpman' in Donkey Kong (1981), where he had to rescue his girlfriend from the ape!

questions.question: Which Mario game introduced Yoshi?
questions.explanation: Yoshi first appeared in Super Mario World (1990) for the Super Nintendo!

questions.question: What was Mario's first 3D platformer?
questions.explanation: Super Mario 64 (1996) was the first 3D Mario game and a launch title for the Nintendo 64!

questions.question: Super Mario Odyssey features a hat named Cappy that Mario can throw.
questions.explanation: In Super Mario Odyssey (2017), Cappy allows Mario to possess enemies and objects by throwing him at them!

questions.question: Which game features Mario using a water-spraying backpack called F.L.U.D.D.?
questions.explanation: Super Mario Sunshine (2002) takes place on Isle Delfino where Mario uses F.L.U.D.D. to clean up goop!

questions.question: What RPG series features Mario, Bowser, and original characters?
questions.explanation: The Mario & Luigi series (starting with Superstar Saga) features turn-based battles with both brothers!

questions.question: The Super Mario Bros. Movie (2023) was produced by Illumination.
questions.explanation: The animated Mario movie was made by Illumination and Nintendo, featuring Chris Pratt as Mario's voice!
